meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>sky</kanji> <kanji>bottle</kanji> is a bottle that has nothing but sky in it. It's an <vocabulary>empty bottle</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a combination of kun'yomi and on'yomi readings. You learned this reading for 空 when you learned 空き缶. If you can remember that, you can remember this too!
